product_name: New Balance Fresh Foam 980 Road-Running Shoes - Women's
long_description: Developed with specialized design software, the women's New Balance Fresh Foam 980 Road-Running Shoes blend a minimalist platform with plush cushion for runners who want a lower, more natural feel. Breathable air mesh and simple no-sew overlays wrap the feet in the right places. 4mm heel-to-toe drop encourages a natural midfoot or forefoot strike to promote forward momentum and reduce the impact of heel striking. Fresh Foam midsole, a performance midsole compound, delivers plush cushioning. Medial post consists of higher-density compression-molded EVA, located on inside edge of shoe, to help prevent over-pronation. A full-ground-contact, blown rubber outsole complements the shoe's cushioning and delivers a smooth ride.
short_description: Developed with specialized design software, the women's New Balance Fresh Foam 980 Road-Running Shoes blend a minimalist platform with plush cushion for runners who want a lower, more natural feel.
